data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Karimganj, Assam, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Karimganj, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,200,276 lost people in  Karimganj, Assam, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Karimganj, Assam, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Karimganj, Assam, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Ranabhat people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Karimganj who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Jesus, please help the 13,516 believers in the county of Karimganj to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary:
the county of Karimganj, Assam, India has a population of 1,228,700.

We estimate Karimganj has 13,516 people who might know Jesus, 14,908 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,200,276 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Karimganj, Assam, India that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

location.name: Karimganj
location.people_groups_list: Bishnupriya Manipuri, Assamese (Sikh traditions), Murasing, Chhetri, Chepang
